permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1994 Journal of Consumer Research, Inc.

abstract.p: This article reviews the nature of hermeneutic philosophy and the assumptions and features of a textual interpretation consistent with this perspective. The relationship of hermeneutic philosophy to the interpretive and critical theory traditions in consumer research is also discussed.
